r.s: Represent XML data in a tree structure
r.d: Allows for the building of XML data structures using a tree representation, without the need for an extension like DOMXML.
r.n: - Added support for mixed element content (cox) - Added identation for $node->get() (cox) - Adapted API to PEAR coding standars (mj) - Added getTreeFromString() (cox) - Root node now stores attributes (mj, cox) - Improved clone(), added insert_child() and remove_child() (bernd) (Backwards compatibility preserved)
